epfl.lia.logist.tools.dijkstra
Class Path

java.lang.Object
  epfl.lia.logist.tools.dijkstra.Path

public class Path
extends java.lang.Object

A path is a list of consecutive cities through which a vehicle can travel. If there is a road from A to B, a possible path is (A,B). If the road from A to B passes through C, (A,B) is not a possible path, and only (A,C,B) is a valid path. So is (B,C,A). The distance of the road connecting the two ends of the path is also stored.
